message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value it brings, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to negotiate a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm counteroffering at $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $10,500 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $11,500. This is my final concession, and I'm hoping we can meet at a mutually beneficial price.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in negotiating. I would like to counteroffer at $11,000 for the product.

Bob, I'm surprised you're coming back to $11,000 after my last offer. I'm not willing to go back to that price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $12,000. This is my last chance to get a good deal, and I hope you can meet me at this price.
